name: The Final Battle Against the Obsidian Dragon and Its Foul Brood Which Dwells in a Realm of Deathless Horror That is...
name_original: The Final Battle Against the Obsidian Dragon and Its Foul Brood Which Dwells in a Realm of Deathless Horror That is...
description:
A short "game" made for the Boss Battle Build Bout contest.  Slay the Obsidian Dragon, save the world, something like that.

Starring:

  •  Harold as the Holy Champion, a stalwart protector of the Light who protects his friends at all cost
  • Therese as the Weapon Master, wielding an impressive collection of powerful legendary weapons against her foes to devastating effect
  • Marsha as the Witch, master of curses and destructive magic that knows know equal
  • Lucius as the Alchemist, whose concoctions and transmutations keep everybody else going through thick and thin

Additional info:

  • This game consists of a single battle against the Obsidian Dragon.
  • First time playthroughs should be done on the "Casual" difficulty.  "Hardcore" lives up to its name and expects you to have an understanding of the mechanics going in.  You were warned!
